summary.para: Contains classes that implement reporting functionality in Blazor applications.
A controller that processes requests to print or export the document.
Base class to implement a controller that processes requests to print or export the document.
A document viewer component for reports.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.value: A zero-based page index.
